_description: Mantine uses open-color as its foundation. Each color has 10 shades (0-9), where higher indices represent darker variations.

colorShades.description: Each color requires at least 10 shades (indices 0-9)

primaryColor.description: Set theme.primaryColor to any color key to establish default component colors

primaryShade.description: Controls which shade (0-9) applies by default

virtualColors.description: Special colors that differ between light and dark modes using virtualColor function

colorFunctions.colorsTuple: Converts single colors or arrays into Mantine color tuples
colorFunctions.generateColors: Creates 10-shade palettes from single hex values
